Recommendations: bigger library budget allocation should be provided to carryout the recommendations of the accreditor for the next level of accreditation
staff development program should not be limited to trainingsseminar but extended to scholarship educational tours and exchange librarians program local national and international
library automation and integrated library systems should be given priority in the library budget
the universitychief librarians should conduct an actionapplied research for the improvement of the library service
subscription of journals per curriculum program should be given priority
acquisition of print and nonprint information resources is a continuous process to update the library collection
the card catalog periodical index information files and others should be updated
reading center information materials should be classified and catalogued
thesisdissertations and nonprint materials should be classified and catalogued
library board committee should be more functional
library manual should include the librarys internal administration and operational activities
the library development plan should indicate the systematic and continuous programs and include the modern trends in the filed of librarianships
strategies should be looked into to motivate the students to use the main library which is full of rich information resources both print and nonprint
